name: Twilight Highway
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------

You're going nowhere and you're going fast.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Put whatever music you want  into the Music folder (preferably MP3) then start playing.

Controls:

  • W to move forward
  • A and D turn the bike
  • Hold Escape to quit

You can also get this game by subscribing to my Patreon. You'll also get access to all the other games I've released on Patreon.

If you're playing on Mac or Linux tell me if the game works or not. I don't know if I put the music folder in the right place for those builds.
